author: axic3354
content:
For those interested in the EVM Object Format (EIP-3540), here's a new overview document: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/evm-object-format-overview

This gives an explanation of why two hard forks, gives a roadmap of different features we investigate (Shanghai, Cancun, and beyond), and links to all relevant resources.

(Also plan to drop the two-hard fork explainer from the EIP to simplify it.)
